description.main: I help teams deliver software of exceptional quality ‚Äî and help them deliver it to the customers a lot faster at the same time.
description.cta: Need someone like me to strengthen your team?

tdd.title: Test-Driven Development
tdd.description: I write tests first, then code. This approach ensures robust, bug-free software with comprehensive test coverage. My TDD practice leads to better design decisions and maintainable codebases.

architecture.title: Software Architecture
architecture.description: I design scalable, maintainable systems using proven architectural patterns. From monoliths to microservices, I choose the simplest architecture based on the requirements of each unique project.

delivery.title: Continuous Delivery
delivery.description: I implement robust CI/CD pipelines that enable teams to ship features rapidly and reliably. Through automated testing, progressive deployments, and infrastructure as code, I help organizations achieve true continuous delivery with confidence.

author.name: Jordy van Vorselen
author.description: Senior Software Engineer passionate about building scalable, maintainable software solutions. Always eager to tackle new challenges and collaborate with amazing teams.
